name: Number Crush: Match Ten Puzzle
description:
A NEWEST number logic puzzle game: Number Crush - Match Ten Puzzle is coming! Playing Number Crush is a useful pastime for your brain. Train your logic and concentration skills.

Immerse yourself in the world of math number games! Take a break and play Number Crush levels whenever you feel tired or bored. Refresh yourself by solving addictive logic puzzles and matching numbers! If you like classic board games, try Number Crush. Enjoy the magic of digits and give your brain a great time.

Number Crush - Match Ten Puzzle is an easy to learn logic game that puts your gray matter to work! Merge numbers to achieve the level target. Coordinate your eyes, hands and mind. Enjoy hours of fun with this free number game. Time flies when you're having fun! Install the number game now to try it and you won't be able to stop!


How to play

- Cross out the pairs of the same numbers (6-6, 3-3, 8-8) or those which add up to 10 (2-8, 3-7 etc). Two numbers can be removed by tapping on them one by one.
- You can connect pairs in adjacent horizontal, vertical and diagonal cells, as well as at the end of one line and the beginning of the next.
- The goal is to complete the level target.


Features

- Easy to learn and quite addictive
- No time limit, so no rush, just relax playing number games
- Special props like Hammers, Swaps, Hints and Undos
- Hours of gameplay for you to enjoy
- Free to play and no wifi needed


Millions of people all over the world are in love with the Number Crush - Match Ten Puzzle. If you like Sudoku, Nonogram, crossword puzzles or any other number games, this game is perfect for you. Take the challenge, and train your brain NOW! Play this number game anywhere, anytime! This entertaining mind game will bring you hours of fun!
